Analysis of IATI/IASC GAM gender marker alignment

title.narrative: Analyse any alignment: IATI gender marker/IASC GAM, sharing findings with IATI/hum. community
Identifying incentives/barriers to use of IATI/IATI tools, further ID'ing signatories use data/tools
Draft vision for transparency beyond Grand Bargain developed and shared with GB co-conveners
Dashboard revised, remaining in use w/GB signatories & wider IATI communities until December 2020
Examples of IATI data use cases, needs and gaps published, & key messages on improving use
Key stakeholders, opportunities and forums for outreach and consultation on data visualisation proto
Create and publish an interim report by May 2020, ahead of the final report December. Dissemin
Publication of synthesis report, prepared by PWYF. Data use of in country actors in protract. crises
Two annual updates with agreed infographics, using data from the revised dashboard and KIIs
FTS-IATI guidance key thoughts disseminated to GB signatories and wider hum./IATI community
Strategic Support provided to GB workstream signatories in implementing transparency commitments
Provide proper tech support for GB signatories to help overcome capacity/publishing constraints
Organise a technical GB transparency workshop to share signatory learnings and how data is used
Data visualisation prototypes developed for four GB commitment areas.
